description: This file defines the NotesService class for managing notes in an Angular application. It includes methods for creating, updating, deleting, and retrieving notes, as well as filtering and persisting note data.

classes.name: NotesService
classes.description: Service class for managing notes, including CRUD operations, filtering, and persistence.

methods.name: constructor
methods.description: Initializes the NotesService, loads stored notes or seeds demo notes, and ensures tags are registered.

methods.name: persist
methods.description: Persists the current notes to storage.

methods.name: seedDemo
methods.description: Seeds the service with demo notes if no stored notes are found.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new empty note with optional notebook ID.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates properties of an existing note by ID.
